page.title: 19FARMING NEAR COWPLAIN
page.content: Around the edge of the built up area of our Block farming is an important activity, particularly nr Horndean. There is a mixture of land use.Herds of dairy and beef cattle are found and flocks of sheep occur on the Padnell Estate.Pyle Farm grows wheat for flour, barley for malt and oats for breakfast cereals.Hook Cottage has an interesting private animal collection. One farmer said he liked his work in earlier times when there was a greater variety of work on each farm. Modern machinery has replaced labourers because it is more efficient.Nr Wecock some farmland has been sold for more housing and in general farmland close to housing estates remains as rough grassland and is little used.Patches of mixed woodland owned by the Forestry Commission, particularly to the east completes the scene.
